lead_paragraph: A two-goal deficit was no big deal for the Pittsburgh Penguins. Phil Kessel and company responded with one big finish.

headline.print_headline: Kessel Helps Penguins Rally Past Red Wings 5-3
headline.main: Kessel Helps Penguins Rally Past Red Wings 5-3
